name: 恩里科·费米
bio_short: 意大利裔美国物理学家，“核时代的设计师”。他在理论物理学（费米-狄拉克统计、贝塔衰变理论）和实验物理学（核裂变、建造第一个核反应堆）上都做出了奠基性贡献。
bio_short_en: An Italian-American physicist, the 'architect of the nuclear age'. He made foundational contributions to both theoretical physics (Fermi-Dirac statistics, Beta-decay theory) and experimental physics (nuclear fission, building the first nuclear reactor).
